item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description:
Hi, in this blog I will post some interesting things that I learn in my travels and studies around the world with special focus in my two favorities contries Japan and Italy.

I post mostly in english but due that I am mexican somethimes also in spanish

I still learning english, you will observe that I still need to improve my grammar skills

In the future maybe I will also post in Italian or Japanese :)
